data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_da02742f59013365923b216420bc4082.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Natan gains a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Entanglement</font> each time he or his <font color="a6aafb">Reverse-Clone</font> hits an enemy with a skill (up to 6 stacks). Each stack lasts 5s and grants 7.5% Attack Speed and 7.5% Movement Speed.

Natan's Basic Attack projectiles will return to Natan after reaching the maximum range, dealing an extra 30<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+65% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies along the way (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).

Natan shoots a dense mass of energy in the target direction, dealing 225<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+130% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path.

Natan launches a Gravitational Attractor in the target direction, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+65% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path and knocking them back.
The Attractor detonates upon reaching the maximum range, dealing 30<font color="fba51f"> (+10% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+13% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and knocking them back.

Natan summons a <font color="a6aafb">Reverse-Clone</font> that lasts 10s at 6 units away. The <font color="a6aafb">Reverse-Clone</font> copies his moves and attacks in reverse and inherits 35% of his Basic Attack and skill damage.
<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Natan switches places with the <font color="a6aafb">Reverse-Clone</font>.

Each cast reduces other skills' remaining cooldowns by 50%. The <font color="a6aafb">Reverse-Clone</font> will disappear if Natan is too far away.

data.name: Natan

__data.skilldesc: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.5 Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+1.7 Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, [C2knocking back] nearby enemies and dealing <Num1>-<Num2> [C1Magic Damage] (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldescemblem: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Attack Speed with Magic Attacks for maximum mixed damage.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After every <Num1> separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by <%Num2> for <Num3>s.########[8098ab]A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After every 3 separate Basic Attacks or skills hit an enemy hero, all damage dealt increases by 8% for 6s.

<font color="8098ab">A single Basic Attack or skill that deals damage multiple times only counts as 1</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
equiplist.equipskill2: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Affliction: Each Basic Attack deals extra 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.3 Total Magic Power)</font> Magic Damage.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+55 Magic Power
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal
+5% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Crisis: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will apply additional 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> True Damage with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+70 Magic Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+6 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

recommendmasterplan.name: ARH
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: The savior who travels through time and space.

assist.desc: Natan's Ultimate allows him to blink a great distance, so he works best with initiator heroes such as Johnson and Alpha because he can dive with them and unleash a lot of damage.

strong.desc: Natan is strong against Tanks with low mobility such as Tigreal and Gatotkaca because he can easily avoid their control abilities with his UIltimate and get more hits in with his Basic Attacks on slower targets.

weak.desc: Natan is countered by heroes with targeted control and high burst like Saber and Eudora that can lock him down and finish him off.
